intro.en: Explore some of my technical projects and creative solutions
intro.zh: 探索我的一些技术项目和创意解决方案

title.en: Want to collaborate on a project?

body.en: If you have an interesting project idea, I'd love to work with you!
body.zh: 如果您有有趣的项目想法，我很乐意与您合作！

title.zh: 基于LLM的电子表格处理代理

description.en: Research project exploring the application of Large Language Models in spreadsheet handling and data processing.
description.zh: 研究项目，探索大型语言模型在电子表格处理和数据应用中的应用。

title.en: Build Your Own World - 2D Maze Game
title.zh: 构建你自己的世界 - 2D迷宫游戏

description.en: Java-based 2D maze game with saving/loading functionality and A* algorithm pathfinding implementation.
description.zh: 基于Java的2D迷宫游戏，具有保存/加载功能和A*算法路径查找实现。

description.en: 2-stage pipelined CPU implementation using Logisim hardware simulator with smart branch prediction.
description.zh: 使用Logisim硬件模拟器实现的2级流水线CPU，具有智能分支预测功能。

description.en: Exploration of 3D generative models and creation of animated character simulation using Mixamao and Unity.
description.zh: 探索3D生成模型，并使用Mixamao和Unity创建动画角色模拟。
